verses.verse: Now <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>, <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>with<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%>, and <S%H5375>honourable<s%>, because by him the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> unto <S%H758>Syria<s%>: he was also a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H2428>valour<s%>, but he was a <S%H6879>leper<s%>.

And the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> had gone <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H1416>companies<s%>, and had brought away <S%H7617>captive<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5291>maid<s%>; and she waited <S%H6440>on<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H1404>mistress<s%>, <S%H305>Would<s%> God my <S%H113>lord<s%> were <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that is in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>! <S%H227>for<s%> he would <S%H622>recover<s%> him of his <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

And one went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H113>lord<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus and thus <S%H1696>said<s%> the <S%H5291>maid<s%> that is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H3212>to<s%>, <S%H935>go<s%>, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H5612>letter<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And he <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>raiment<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H5612>letter<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Now when this <S%H5612>letter<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, behold, I have therewith <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to thee, that thou mayest <S%H622>recover<s%> him of his <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7121>read<s%> the <S%H5612>letter<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Am I <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> and to make <S%H2421>alive<s%>, that this <S%H2088>man<s%> doth <S%H7971>send<s%> unto me to <S%H622>recover<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>? <S%H389>wherefore<s%> <S%H3045>consider<s%>, I pray you, and <S%H7200>see<s%> how he seeketh a <S%H579>quarrel<s%> against me.

¶ And it was so, when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore hast thou <S%H7167>rent<s%> thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>? let him <S%H935>come<s%> now to me, and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H5483>horses<s%> and with his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%>.

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%> to thee, and thou shalt be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

But <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%>, and went <S%H3212>away<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I <S%H559>thought<s%>, He will <S%H3318>surely<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to me, and <S%H5975>stand<s%>, and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5130>strike<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H622>recover<s%> the <S%H6879>leper<s%>.

Are not <S%H71%H549>Abana<s%> and <S%H6554>Pharpar<s%>, <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, <S%H2896>better<s%> than all the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? may I not <S%H7364>wash<s%> in them, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>? So he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H3212>away<s%> in a <S%H2534>rage<s%>.

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%>, if the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H1696>bid<s%> thee do some <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>, wouldest thou not have <S%H6213>done<s%> it? how much rather <S%H637>then<s%>, when he <S%H559>saith<s%> to thee, <S%H7364>Wash<s%>, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>?

Then went he <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> like unto the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%>, and he was <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, he and all his <S%H4264>company<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is no <S%H430>God<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, but in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: now therefore, I pray thee, <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.

But he <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand<s%>, I will <S%H3947>receive<s%> none. And he <S%H6484>urged<s%> him to <S%H3947>take<s%> it; but he <S%H3985>refused<s%>.

And <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Shall there not then, I pray thee, be <S%H5414>given<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6776>two<s%> <S%H6505>mules'<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%>? for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> will henceforth <S%H6213>offer<s%> neither burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> nor <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, but unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

In this <S%H1697>thing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that when my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H935>goeth<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> there, and he <S%H8172>leaneth<s%> on my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and I <S%H7812>bow<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>: when I bow <S%H7812>down<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> in this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>. So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way<s%>.

¶ But <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%>, the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, my <S%H113>master<s%> hath <S%H2820>spared<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> this <S%H761>Syrian<s%>, in not <S%H3947>receiving<s%> at his <S%H3027>hands<s%> that which he <S%H935>brought<s%>: but, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, I will <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3972>somewhat<s%> of him.

So <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>. And when <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H7323>running<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, he lighted <S%H5307>down<s%> from the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is all <S%H7965>well<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, All is <S%H7965>well<s%>. My <S%H113>master<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, even now there be <S%H935>come<s%> to me from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>: <S%H5414>give<s%> them, I pray thee, a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%>.

And <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Be <S%H2974>content<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> two <S%H3603>talents<s%>. And he <S%H6555>urged<s%> him, and <S%H6696>bound<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2754>bags<s%>, with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H5414>laid<s%> them upon <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5288>servants<s%>; and they <S%H5375>bare<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6076>tower<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> them from their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6485>bestowed<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%>: and he let the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

But he went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> before his <S%H113>master<s%>. And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H370>Whence<s%> comest thou, <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> no <S%H575>whither<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1980>Went<s%> not mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> with thee, when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> again from his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee? Is it a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%>, and to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%>, and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H8198>maidservants<s%>?

The <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> therefore of <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto thee, and unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. And he went <S%H3318>out<s%> from his <S%H6440>presence<s%> a <S%H6879>leper<s%> as white as <S%H7950>snow<s%>.
